Instruction: Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Brush olive oil onto a baking sheet.
Mix the ingredients in a bowl until well blended, let the dough rest, then form into logs, cut into slices, coat in egg white and sesame seeds, and place them on cookie sheets.
